EmailTemplate.name: Website Authorization
EmailTemplate.subject: Website Authorization Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear, {!Contact.OwnerFirstName}
{!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Attendee_Name__c} has completed the 2 required classes for Website Authorization, Admin Website Management and Admin Website Custom Content.
{!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Attendee_Name__c} is now approved by VinSolutions to make changes to your website.
We now need approval by you to add him to the list of Admins in your website.
Please send your approval via this email.
Respectfully,
Jennifer Merrick Manager of Virtual Training
